title: Squad Busters 2.0 and Supercell's YOLO Game Launch Strategy

rawLines.text: [Music]
So, because it was a slow news week, I
was allowed to to talk about
Squadbusters. So, Squadbusters and
Supercell made some news. In short,

lapse users. This overhaul, referred as
Squabbusters 2.0, introduces several key

before each match. There actually only
four heroes. I'm going to talk about

Yeah. And basically, they're adding like
